sourcesContent:
Triệu gọi HTTP GET - List of Book

{{errMessage}}
BookId BookName Price Image
{{book.bookID}} {{book.bookName}} {{book.price}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BookAPIService } from '../services/book-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-m5-get-listbook', templateUrl: './m5-get-listbook.component.html', styleUrls: ['./m5-get-listbook.component.css'], }) export class M5GETListbookComponent { books: any; errMessage: string = ''; constructor(private _service: BookAPIService) { this._service.getBooks().subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.books = data; }, error: (err) => { this.errMessage = err; }, }); } }
